summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3943 for the improvement of 61st Avenue South, from Waters Avenue to Ryan Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48103, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
